content:
Resorts Services and Amenities

 

As of December 14, 2015 we have combined our most widely used services and amenities in a Resort Fee to provide our guests with the very best experience during their stay at Split Rock.

As a result of this program, you'll receive only the best from Split Rock resort:

  • Live Entertainment
  • Laser Tag
  • WiFi (excludes Westwood Villas)
  • Volleyball
  • Miniature Golf
  • Soccer
  • Bicylces, Billiards, Racquetball
  • Fitness Center
  • Archery
  • Indoor and Outdoor Pools
  • Local and Toll Free Calls
  • Daily Activities and Craft Time led by our Recreation Team
  • Softball
  • Tennis
  • Basketball
  • Fishing
  • Resort Shuttle
  • Ice Skating
  • Sledding
  • Ping Pong
  • Bocceball
  • Shuffleboard

Some Activities are seasonal and weather permitting. The resort fee of $20 plus tax per occupied room is a daily charge. This charge will be automatically billed to your guestroom account and is subject to change.
